8 #include "planning/planner/motion_command.hpp"
9 #include "planning/rotation_command.hpp"

11 struct RobotIntent {
12  using Msg = rj_msgs::msg::RobotIntent;
13  enum class ShootMode { KICK, CHIP };
14  enum class TriggerMode { STAND_DOWN, IMMEDIATE, ON_BREAK_BEAM };
15 
16  planning::MotionCommand motion_command;
17 
19  rj_geometry::ShapeSet local_obstacles;
20 
21  ShootMode shoot_mode = ShootMode::KICK;
22  TriggerMode trigger_mode = TriggerMode::STAND_DOWN;
23  float kick_speed = 0;
24  float dribbler_speed = 0;
25 
26  bool is_active = false;
27 
28  int8_t priority = 0;
29 };
30 
31 namespace rj_convert {
32 
33 template <>
34 struct RosConverter<RobotIntent, rj_msgs::msg::RobotIntent> {
35  static rj_msgs::msg::RobotIntent to_ros(const RobotIntent& from) {
36  return rj_msgs::build<rj_msgs::msg::RobotIntent>()
37  .motion_command(convert_to_ros(from.motion_command))
38  .local_obstacles(convert_to_ros(from.local_obstacles))
39  .shoot_mode(static_cast<uint8_t>(from.shoot_mode))
40  .trigger_mode(static_cast<uint8_t>(from.trigger_mode))
41  .kick_speed(convert_to_ros(from.kick_speed))
42  .dribbler_speed(convert_to_ros(from.dribbler_speed))
43  .is_active(convert_to_ros(from.is_active))
44  .priority(convert_to_ros(from.priority));
45  }
46 
47  static RobotIntent from_ros(const rj_msgs::msg::RobotIntent& from) {
48  RobotIntent result;
49  result.motion_command = convert_from_ros(from.motion_command);
50  result.local_obstacles = convert_from_ros(from.local_obstacles);
51  result.shoot_mode = static_cast<RobotIntent::ShootMode>(from.shoot_mode);
52  result.trigger_mode = static_cast<RobotIntent::TriggerMode>(from.trigger_mode);
53  result.kick_speed = convert_from_ros(from.kick_speed);
54  result.dribbler_speed = convert_from_ros(from.dribbler_speed);
55  result.is_active = convert_from_ros(from.is_active);
56  result.priority = convert_from_ros(from.priority);
57  return result;
58  }
59 };
60 
61 ASSOCIATE_CPP_ROS(RobotIntent, rj_msgs::msg::RobotIntent);
62 
63 } // namespace rj_convert

Set of obstacles added by plays.
